unnormalised: Arrey yaar, stats examachi tayari korun korun jivan nakko zala mhaka! Kal, hanv ek bagantli, jantun 5 tambdi, 3 nili, ani 2 hirvi ball asat, tantunli 2 tambdi ball kaddpachi probability kaddtakuch ravlo. Sodlyant mhaka mell'li, Uttar aslem okolo 0.22, mhun dista? Pun, mazi didi-n tika classantli marksachi standard deviation vichaarli - kashi 65, 70, 75, 80, ani 85. Ekaek mhaka dislem ki hanv class 8-ant assan! Chai break zai, magir Bayes' theorem korun ravum. Exam asa 20/11-ak ani mhaka kainch kollona.
normalised: Arrey yaar, statistics exam prep mhaka maarun uddoitaa! Kal, hanv ek baggent panch tambdde, teen nille, ani don hirve gend asat tedna don tambdde gendh kadtlechi probability kaddpak sodtalem. Shevttak tem solve kelem, jawab zero point don don aspas ailo, mhaka dista? Pun, magir mazyen didi-n tiche classantle marks-anchem standard deviation vishim vicharlem - sumar saathec panch, sattar, saathec panchattar, assi, ani assi panch. Achanak mazyen class aathveen aslyaso dista! Chai break zai, magir Bayes' theorem-ak portun vochchem. Exam visaveen November-ak asa ani puren harapon gelya sarke dista.
